Instruction: Wash and dice the potatoes into bite-sized cubes.
In a large bowl, combine the diced potatoes, lemon juice, olive oil, garlic powder, dried thyme, salt, and black pepper. Toss until the potatoes are evenly coated.
Spread the potatoes in a single layer on a baking sheet lined with parchment paper.
Roast in the preheated oven for 25-30 minutes, or until the potatoes are golden brown and crispy, stirring halfway through cooking.
Remove from the oven and serve hot as a delicious lemon-infused side dish.
